alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Knox; Morrow; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 2:03AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Richland, southeastern Morrow, Knox and Holmes Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 203 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Gambier to near Sunbury. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mount Vernon, Millersburg, Berlin, Walnut Creek, Fredericktown, Gambier, Utica, Centerburg, Danville, Killbuck, Glenmont, Chesterville, Nashville, Sparta, Winesburg, Farmerstown, Butler, Baltic, Marengo and Martinsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
